availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel A. Kelley (1st ky cavalry regiment)

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Estill County native. Married to Martha J. Henderson Kelley in Estill County on December 8, 1856. Father of Mary E. Kelley and Martha J. Kelley. Farmer in Estill County in 1860. Sergeant, first lieutenant, and captain in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from August 6, 1861, to April 28, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 99.
